heading: HR01682
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE SHORTAGE IN GOVERNMENT-SUBSIDIZED RICE AS RECENTLY ALLEGED BY THE NATIONAL FOOD ADMINISTRATION (NFA) FOLLOWING RELIEF OPERATIONS FOR VICTIMS OF STRIFE AND TYPHOONS IN 2017 AND IMMEDIATELY PUT IN PLACE COUNTERMEASURES IN ORDER TO EFFECTIVELY ADDRESS THE DEARTH
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2018-02-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01682
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE SHORTAGE IN GOVERNMENT-SUBSIDIZED RICE AS RECENTLY ALLEGED BY THE NATIONAL FOOD ADMINISTRATION (NFA) FOLLOWING RELIEF OPERATIONS FOR VICTIMS OF STRIFE AND TYPHOONS IN 2017 AND IMMEDIATELY PUT IN PLACE COUNTERMEASURES IN ORDER TO EFFECTIVELY ADDRESS THE DEARTH
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2018-02-13
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2018-02-28
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2018-02-19;
